page.title: 01Local Free Newspaper
page.content: {The Trader}has been in operation for 13 years.The Trader employs 30-40 people.The Trader issues 144,000 papers a week, which are sent to Worksop and the surrounding villages. About fifty per cent of the Whitwell Edition is about the village itself. {Local Issues We looked at back copies of the Trader for the last eight months.The following articles had appeared; A one-way system for Whitwell How to make use of the old school Several Cubs and Brownies events Advertisements for Brass Band members Many events at the Primary School Supertroopers marching band dates Rugby club results Coffee mornimgs and charity events at chapel Forming a mother-and-toddlers group
